you click upper button 4. you click left button than left button and than you should be able to select something, just select english version i got english version like that hope i helped.

Inorder get an english version of this game.
1. If already installed please uninstall and re-install it.
2. During installation, on the screen after the location of the game to be installed screen.
3. Click on the drop down menu and select ENGLISH VERSION.
4. Give next and continue to install.
5. Voila!!....You get to play the game in ENGLISH!!....
